# Box

<Subtitle>
  The Box component is the root of all components and supports space, layout,
  flexbox, border, position, and color styled props from styled-system.
</Subtitle>

Building block of layouts. Creates a box-model context

<Preview withToolbar withSource="open">

        Disabled placeholder
      </option>
      <option value="value-1">Value 1 is long</option>
      <option value="value-2">Value 2</option>
      <option value="value-3">Value 3</option>
      <option value="value-4">Value 4</option>
    </Select>
